Don't Forget the ‘optgroup’ Element via Webdesign Tuts+

My most recent article over at Webdesign Tuts+ is a quick overview of the rather useful but often forgotten optgroup HTML element. The optgroup element is very handy in responsive web design. It can be conveniently employed when condensing a complex hierarchical navigation links into a single menu.
